scripts.publish: yarn run build && yarn run compliance && lerna publish --dist-tag latest --pre-dist-tag next
scripts.build: nx run-many --target=build --all --exclude=@sockethub/server,sockethub && nx run-many --target=build --projects=@sockethub/server && nx run-many --target=build --projects=sockethub
scripts.dev: yarn run build && cd apps/sockethub; yarn run dev
scripts.integration: yarn run integration:setup && yarn run integration:run; RES=$?; if [[ "$RES" != "0" ]]; then yarn run integration:log; fi; yarn run integration:teardown; exit $RES
scripts.integration:clean: docker rm sockethub-sockethub-1 sockethub-redis-1 sockethub-prosody-1; docker rmi sockethub_sockethub
